messages.messageBody:
> Date: Sat, 30 Dec 2000 18:32:40 -0500
> From: "April Spitzer" <aprilspit@...>
>Subject: Re: Dishwasher detergent
>
>I think that adding a splash of vinegar to the rinse cycle would solve that
>problem, it does for me :)



I tried the vinegar last night and it seems to have helped. The dishes
were not spotted and looked clean. I love vinegar for it's many uses. Thanks!

Olivia
